channel.title: Please Don't Leave Taharok
channel.description:
MESSAGE TO TAHAROK Taharok, dont leave man i like what you have done with the tut section you are a highly repected person/coder dont leave you deserved that mod spot well cya hope ull listen to this
MESSAGE TO ALL DA PEEPS OF MOPARSCAPE FORUMS listen guys help me get taharok to stay he has done nothing wrong and is getting abused for nuthing so can you sign this petion asking him to stay maybe it might just work well it would be much appriciated well bye plz sign cyas all l8er................................
MESSAGE TO TAHAROK FLAMERS FUCK ALL YOU FUCKING NOOBS HE IS JUST TRYING TO DO WHAT IS BEST FOR THE COMMUNITY SO FUCK USE ASSHOLES - PLZ DONT BAN ME MOPAR
Please sing or vote i have added voteing to this forums please guys do this for Taharok ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Taharok this will show you peeps really care

item.title: Please Don't Leave Taharok
item.dc:creator: @Philosophica Philosophica
item.description:
@Philosophica wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:13, topic:34341”]K Verac … First : I was not flaming. second: This is not YOUR forum. Thirth: Ok if a mod told you. I believe you. Fourth: I’m not a great coder. I know that. But I know some basics. I can’t imagine you are a great coder. Fifth : You shouldn’t offend people because they have an other opinion. Seventh: Mod taharok will decide himself I think. Maybe im wrong I don’t know.

Anyway, thx for talking friendly

Grtz

Jens[/quote]

Third*…and you missed number 6

~Philo

Read full topic

I can’t imagine you are a great coder. Fifth : You shouldn’t offend people because they have an other opinion. sixth: Mod taharok will decide himself I think. Maybe im wrong I don’t know.

Anyway, thx for talking friendly

@Pk_Verac wrote:

jensie i was told by a mod to put in thisd section so =-P and also
Mod Taharok is leaving because of noobs like you who like to flame
this is not spam this is showing someone that we want them to stay
so please dont flame on my forum. if it wasnt for people like taharok
there wouldnt be any moparscape or anything i bet you cant even code
you just use other peoples folders say so if im wrong and i will apolagise
but is say it nice NOT FLAMING then i will get angry well thank you for
your oppinion even though it was not needed
yours truly,
Ramon Head Manager of RCORP

item.title: Please Don't Leave Taharok
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“chipmunk man, post:6, topic:34341”]Jensie…Your noob with no rep and hes just trying to get Taharok [like one of the best helpers] to stay…People abusing him…Pming me and saying that to me too…[/quote] Maybe I am a noob with no rep , but i actually got a life… and this is just spam I bet mod taharok just deletes this because it’s in the wrong section… and + he calles ppl assholes, fucking noobs… I mean , are we suposed to accept this? He is flaming … I asked to stop spamming , I asked friendly… So you shouldn’t call me a noob … as I’m not calling you a noob.

Thx
Jens
